S06psp_2-3u:87_6: sarveṣu teṣu nityam iti na sthātavyam evam anityam iti sukham iti duḥkham ity ātmeti
S06psp_2-3u:87_7: anātmeti śāntam ity aśāntam iti viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:88: śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nimittam ity animittam iti praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:89_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:89_1: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:90: buddhatvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyaṃ. srotaāpanno dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam,
S06psp_2-3u:93: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. iti kṣāntigatam
S06psp_2-3u:94_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:94_1: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:94_2: bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmāv aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:94_3: upalambhayogena. prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:94_4: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:94_6: paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:94_7: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramyāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthāsyāmīti,
S06psp_2-3u:95_0: evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:95_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu
S06psp_2-3u:96_0: buddhāṃś ca bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya pūjanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya
S06psp_2-3u:96_1: ca śrutvā ca tathatvāya pratipatsye pareṣāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:96_2: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:96_3: buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:96_4: upalambhayogena. sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:96_5: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv gatvā
S06psp_2-3u:96_6: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:97_0: evam api na sthātavyam aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_2-3u:97_1: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyaṃ. pañca cakṣūṃṣi utpādayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:97_2: na sthātavyaṃ māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:97_3: na sthātavyaṃ sarvasamādhīn niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ. yena yena punaḥ samādhinākāṅkṣiṣyāmi
S06psp_2-3u:97_4: vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti
S06psp_2-3u:97_5: na sthātavyam. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattir niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_2-3u:97_6: niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ. catvāri vaiśāradyāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:97_7: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_2-3u:97_8: pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. mahāmaitrīṃ
S06psp_2-3u:97_9: mahākaruṇāṃ niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. dvātriṃśac ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye
S06psp_2-3u:97_10: niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. aśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:97_11: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:97_12: srotaāpannaḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparama iti na sthātavyam. kulaṃkula iti ekavīcika iti
S06psp_2-3u:97_13: na sthātavyam. samaśīrṣaḥ pudgala iti na sthātavyam. āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ca na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:97_14: srotaāpanno 'vinipātadharma iti na sthātavyaṃ. sakṛdāgāmī sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya
S06psp_2-3u:97_15: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyāntaṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. anāgāmy anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkriyāyai
S06psp_2-3u:97_16: pratipanna iti na sthātavyam. anāgāmī tatraiva parinirvāyīti na sthātavyam. arhann
S06psp_2-3u:97_17: arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pratipanna iti na sthātavyam. arhann (PSP_2-3:10)
S06psp_2-3u:98_0: ihaivānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāyīti na sthātavyam. pratyekabuddha iti na
S06psp_2-3u:98_1: sthātavyam. bodhisattvo 'tikramya śrāvakābhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau
S06psp_2-3u:98_2: ca sthāsyāmīti na sthātavyam. mārgajñatājñāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. sarvākāreṇa
S06psp_2-3u:98_4: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:99_0: evam api na sthātavyam. caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:99_1: samāpatsye yathārūpeṇa samādhinā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān sthāsyāmīti na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:99_2: upalambhayogena. aparimitaṃ ma āyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:99_4: na sthātavyaṃ. yāvantaḥ pūrveṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottareṇa
S06psp_2-3u:99_5: gaṅgānadivālukopamā lokadhātavas tāvat mamaikaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyatīti na
S06psp_2-3u:99_6: sthātavyam. vajramayo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:100: yas taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeta tasya sarvakāyasya na rāgo bādheta,
S06psp_2-3u:103: na kasyacic chrāvakacittaṃ vā pratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:104: sarve ca te sattvā niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:105: ye ca te sattvās taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyanti teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved iti evam api na sthātavyaṃ. tatra ca buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo,
S06psp_2-3u:109: na vijñānaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam. na dānapāramitāyāḥ śabdo bhaviṣyatīti,
S06psp_2-3u:110: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam. na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti,
S06psp_2-3u:112: evaṃ na yāvat srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatpratyekabuddhabodhisattvabuddhaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:115: sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upalambhayogena na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:117: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam? iti.
S06psp_2-3u:118: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:120: tvam āyuṣmañ śāriputra kva tathāgataḥ sthita iti
S06psp_2-3u:122_0: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgataḥ sthitaḥ. apratiṣṭhitamānasaḥ sa khalu punas
S06psp_2-3u:122_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa na rūpe sthito na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu
S06psp_2-3u:122_2: na vijñāne sthito na saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāsaṃskṛte dhātau sthitaḥ. evaṃ na vyastasamasteṣu
S06psp_2-3u:122_3: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na pāramitāsu na bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu
S06psp_2-3u:122_4: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu nābhijñāsu na satyeṣu sthito na sarvaśūnyatāsu na
S06psp_2-3u:123: na balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:124: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:125: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ. yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na rūpe sthito nāsthitaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:126_0: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthito nāsthitaḥ. evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ
S06psp_2-3u:126_1: śariputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ. sthāsyāmīty asthānayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:127: atha khalu tatra pariṣadi keṣāṃcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:128_0: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni prajñāyante
S06psp_2-3u:128_1: tāni jalpyamānāni. idaṃ punar na vijñāyate yad āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:129: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥiparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:134: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram apy atra na pravyāhriyate,
S06psp_2-3u:138_0: anakṣarā hi prajñāpāramitā tasmān nāsti jñātā na śrotā na deśayitā anakṣarā tathāgatānām
S06psp_2-3u:138_1: arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06psp_2-3u:138_2: buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ so 'bhinirmāya
S06psp_2-3u:140: devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:144_0: evam eva devaputrāḥ. sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic
S06psp_2-3u:144_1: chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātam. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ. svapnāntaragatas
S06psp_2-3u:144_2: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyed dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:145: devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:149_0: evaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ. sarve dharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:149_1: na kenacid ājñātam. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dvau puruṣau parvatakandare sthitvā
S06psp_2-3u:149_2: buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātām.
S06psp_2-3u:149_3: tato dvayor api tayoḥ pratiśrutkāsvaro niścaret. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:150: devaputrā api nu tayā pratiśrutkayā dvitīyaḥ. pratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:154_0: evam eva devaputraḥ. sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamās tatra na kiṃcid deśyate na śrūyate
S06psp_2-3u:154_1: na vijñāyate. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe
S06psp_2-3u:154_2: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣadaḥ so 'bhinirmāya
S06psp_2-3u:154_3: nirmitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06psp_2-3u:155: devaputrā api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā vijñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:159: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā na tatra kaścid (PSP_2-3:13)
S06psp_2-3u:160: deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. iti paropadeśavaiyarthyam
S06psp_2-3u:161: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:165: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:166: na hi devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:167: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:168_0: na rūpasya svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na
S06psp_2-3u:168_1: vijñānasya svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:168_2: na śrotasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na manasaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:168_3: na pṛthivīdhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:169: nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na vijñānadhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:170: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:171_0: na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo
S06psp_2-3u:171_1: gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
S06psp_2-3u:171_2: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya satyānām abhijñānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:171_3: caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:171_4: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādāśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:171_5: svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ na sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:172: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:173: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:174: na khalu punar asyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:175: yāvan na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratityasamutpādaḥ prajñapto na pāramitā prajñaptā na bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:177: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni (PSP_2-3:14)
S06psp_2-3u:178_0: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:178_1: nāpīha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñaptaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:178_2: nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na bodhisattvatvaṃ prajñaptaṃ na bodhiḥ prajñaptā
S06psp_2-3u:179: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:182: sā na kenacid deśitā na kenacic chrutā na kenacid vijñātā. tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:183: ye srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06psp_2-3u:186_0: ye pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prāptukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya. evaṃ hi devaputrā bodhisattvena
S06psp_2-3u:186_1: mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam apravyāhārāśravaṇatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:188: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:190: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:191: māyopamā mama devaputrā dharmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyā nirmitopamā mama dharmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ. te naiva kiṃcic chroṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na sākṣātkariṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:192: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtisthaviram evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_2-3u:193: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dharmaśravaṇikā nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dharmaśravaṇikāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:196: māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dharmaśravaṇikā,
S06psp_2-3u:197: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dharmaśravaṇikāḥ. rūpam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:198_0: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ. cakṣur api
S06psp_2-3u:198_1: devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi devaputrāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:198_2: svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ. rūpam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ (PSP_2-3:15)
S06psp_2-3u:199_0: māyopamaṃ. evaṃ śabdagandharasasparśadharmā api devaputrāḥ. svapnopamā māyopamāś.
S06psp_2-3u:199_1: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā svapnopamā māyopamāḥ. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:199_2: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā svapnopamā
S06psp_2-3u:199_3: māyopamā. dānapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramītā vīryapārmitā
S06psp_2-3u:199_4: dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. evam adhyātmaśūmyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:199_5: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. smṛtyupasthānāny api svapnopamāni.
S06psp_2-3u:200_0: abhijñā satyāni daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_2-3u:200_1: api buddhadharmāḥ svapnopamā māyopamāḥ. srotaāpattiphalam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:200_2: srotaāpanno 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam api sakṛdāgāmy apy anāgāmiphalam
S06psp_2-3u:200_3: apy anāgāmy apy arhatphalam apy arhann api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ pratyekabodhir api
S06psp_2-3u:201: pratyekabuddho 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ. bodhisattvatvam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:202: bodhisattvo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamo. anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir api svapnopamā māyopamā,
S06psp_2-3u:204: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:205: buddhatvam api sthavira subhūte svapnopamaṃ māyopamam iti vadasi. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:208: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamam iti vadāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:209: saced ahaṃ devaputrā nirvāṇād api kaṃcid dharmaviśiṣṭataraṃ jāniyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:210: tam apy ahaṃ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyaṃ. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:211: tathā hi devaputrāḥ svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:213_0: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākauṣṭhila
S06psp_2-3u:213_1: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇiputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo
S06psp_2-3u:213_2: 'nekāni ca devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram evam āhuḥ:

S06psp_2-3u:217_1: evam atarkāyā evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:217_2: duranubodhāyā evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā
S06psp_2-3u:217_3: deśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti. dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ,

S06psp_2-3u:218_2: evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ duranubodhāyā
S06psp_2-3u:218_3: evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā deśyamānāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:219: tena khalu punar na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:221: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:222: na śūnyatāṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na rūpam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:223: nānimittaṃ rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:224: nānimittaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na rūpam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:226: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:227: nāpraṇihitaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. evaṃ nānutpāda iti,
S06psp_2-3u:230: na viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. evaṃ vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgāni sarvapāramitām,
S06psp_2-3u:231_0: evam adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām
S06psp_2-3u:231_1: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgam
S06psp_2-3u:233: evaṃ na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti,

S06psp_2-3u:235: nānimittaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatām apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti,

S06psp_2-3u:240: na viviktaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

S06psp_2-3u:243: nāpraṇihitaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātum anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:244: nānutpādaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātum anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:245: nānirodhaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:246: na śāntaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:247: na viviktaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:248: na śūnyatām asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

S06psp_2-3u:250: nāpraṇihitam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:251: nānutpādam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,

S06psp_2-3u:253: asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:255: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:256: nāsyā devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā yāvad alamāryāyāḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyāḥ kaścit pratyeṣako bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:257: tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmo deśyate na sūcyate na paridīpyate,

S06psp_2-3u:262_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nopapāduko bhaviṣyati. evam abhijñābhir aparihāṇadharmā buddhakṣetrād

S06psp_2-3u:272_1: anupalambhayogena. evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena. pṛthivīdhātor anupalambhayogena,

S06psp_2-3u:537_2: prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā. tathāgataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:537_3: sa devaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahito
S06psp_2-3u:538: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vā mahāyānaṃ vā. na cānyatra dānapāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:539_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā na cānyatra
S06psp_2-3u:539_1: prajñāpāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatāyā na cānyatra
S06psp_2-3u:540_0: yāvan na cānyatrābhāvasvābhāvaśūnyatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra smṛtyupasthānebhyas
S06psp_2-3u:540_3: tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra sarvākārajñatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. bodhisattvā
S06psp_2-3u:540_4: mahāsattvāś ca devaputrāḥ sarveṣv eva dharmeṣu śikṣante dānapāramitāyām ādiṃ kṛtvā
S06psp_2-3u:541_0: devaputrāḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eveti vaktavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaś
S06psp_2-3u:541_1: carati. yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
S06psp_2-3u:541_2: dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyām antarāyaṇamadhyagato dānapāramitayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:541_4: bhaveyam. evam adhyātmaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ bahirdhāśānyatayādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā
S06psp_2-3u:541_5: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānair avirahito bhaveyam.
S06psp_2-3u:541_7: dhyānaiś caturbir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:541_8: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā cānyaiś cāpramāṇair buddhadharmair avirahito bhaveyaṃ tac
S06psp_2-3u:541_9: cānupalambhayogena. tadāhaṃ devaputrās tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto;
S06psp_2-3u:542_0: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvany asminn eva sahālokadhātav asaṃkhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir
S06psp_2-3u:542_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
S06psp_2-3u:542_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān.
S06psp_2-3u:544: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:545_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:545_1: anuparigrāhikā rūpasyāparigrahānutsargayogena. vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparigrahānutsargayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:546_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasraḥ pariṣado bhikṣubhibhṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bodhisattvān
S06psp_2-3u:546_1: mahāsattvāṃś caturo mahārājāṃś cāturmahārājakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān yāvad akaniṣṭhāṃś
S06psp_2-3u:547: ca sarvān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:548_0: ye kecit kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā kulaputrā
S06psp_2-3u:548_1: vā kuladuhitaro vā devaputrā devakanyā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:548_2: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:549: ye ca sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ mārā vā mārakāyikā vā avatāraṃ na lapsyante. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:550: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:551: na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
S06psp_2-3u:553_4: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāśūnyataiva taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
S06psp_2-3u:553_5: ca svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:554: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
S06psp_2-3u:556: nāpraṇihitam apraṇihite 'vatāraṃ labhate. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:557: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_2-3u:562_0: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vāvatāraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:562_1: lapsyate. tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca sarvasattvānām antike maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā
S06psp_2-3u:563: na ca te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:564_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:564_1: samyakparicaryayā upasthitāḥ. yair vā kauśika cāturmahārājakāyikair devaputrair iha
S06psp_2-3u:564_2: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau trayastriṃśair vā yāmair vā tuṣitair vā nirmāṇaratibhir
S06psp_2-3u:564_3: vā paranirmitavaśavartibhir vā brahmakāyikair vā brahmapurohitair vā brahmapārṣadyair
S06psp_2-3u:564_4: vā yāvad akaniṣṭhair vā devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:564_5: na cāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrutā nodgrahītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā,
S06psp_2-3u:565: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittenāvirahitaiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:567_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:567_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:568: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vā abhyavakāśagatānāṃ vā utpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:569: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_2-3u:571: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasunyatā subhāvitā anūpalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:572_0: atha khalu tāvad eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās
S06psp_2-3u:572_1: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paramrmitavaśavartino yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:573_0: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:573_1: saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:573_2: likhiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatācittena. (PSP_2-3:38)
S06psp_2-3u:575: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayā ucchidyante,
S06psp_2-3u:576_0: tiryagyoniyamalokā asurāḥ kāyā manuṣyadāridryā upadravā upasargāḥ. sarve 'py ucchidyante.
S06psp_2-3u:576_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathanāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
S06psp_2-3u:576_2: bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dānapāramitāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:576_4: loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:576_5: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:576_6: caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:576_7: saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:576_8: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām
S06psp_2-3u:576_9: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. anekeṣāṃ samādhīnām
S06psp_2-3u:576_10: anekeṣāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ sarvajñatāyā bodhisattvamārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:577: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:581_0: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante. evaṃ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:581_1: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:582: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:583: srotaāpannaḥ. prajñāyate. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhal loke prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:585: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaparipākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:592_0: saṃgharatnaṃ prajñāyate. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa boodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvayakṣagaruḍakiṃnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyeṇa
S06psp_2-3u:593: evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:595: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayatiryagyoniyamaloke gataya ucchidyante,
S06psp_2-3u:596_0: devadāridryaṃ manuṣyadāridryam upadravā upasargāḥ sarve 'py ucchidyante. bodhisattvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:596_1: mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:596_3: dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:596_5: sarvākārajñatāyā bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni
S06psp_2-3u:596_6: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni bodhisattvaṃ mahāsāttvam āgamya loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:598: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:600: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhaś ca loke prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:606_0: buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke
S06psp_2-3u:606_1: prādurbhāvo bhavati tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
S06psp_2-3u:606_2: lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu
S06psp_2-3u:607: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sa kauśika satkartavyāṃ gurukartavyāṃ mānayitavyāṃ pūjayitavyāṃ manyeta yo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:609: lokena satkartavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā. yaś ca kauśika imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratipūrṇaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:610: tadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā sālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
S06psp_2-3u:611_0: yaś ca prathamacittotpādikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam avirahitaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:611_1: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pujayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati tat
S06psp_2-3u:612: tathā hi na kauśika śrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:613: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ punar āgamya śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:614_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo
S06psp_2-3u:614_1: gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:615: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:616: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto dhārayanto vācayanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvantaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:618: sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti,
S06psp_2-3u:619: buddhakṣetrāc ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsanāya,
S06psp_2-3u:620_0: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣeyus tān buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayituṃ taiḥ pūjayeyus.
S06psp_2-3u:620_1: tac caiṣāṃ tathaiva ṛdhyate. yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike sthitvā dharmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:620_2: śṛṇvanti sa caiṣāṃ dharmas tāvad eva na pramuṣyate yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:620_3: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. iti kulasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti jananīsaṃpadaṃ ca parivārasaṃpadaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:620_4: ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca prabhāsaṃpadaṃ ca cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca svarasaṃpadaṃ ca samādhisaṃpadaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:621: ātmānaṃ buddhavigrahaṃ nirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_2-3u:622_0: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām utpādo nāsti te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:622_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06psp_2-3u:622_2: varṇaṃ bhāṣante. adhyātmaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:622_3: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. dhyānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. apramāṇānām
S06psp_2-3u:622_4: ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. smṛtyupasthānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
S06psp_2-3u:622_5: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:622_6: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:622_7: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakuśalena ca dharmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:623: śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena buddhayānena. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
S06psp_2-3u:624: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:625_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitāyā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:625_1: parigṛhīta bhavanti. yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:625_2: dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:625_4: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni
S06psp_2-3u:625_5: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca parigṛhītāni bhavanti. srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:625_6: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā parigṛhitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:626: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:627_0: prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhitā bhavanti. evaṃ sarve bodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:627_2: satyābhijñāḥ sarve kuśalāḥ karmapathā daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_2-3u:629_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā
S06psp_2-3u:629_1: likhitayā yoniśo manasikṛtayā yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratilabhate
S06psp_2-3u:629_2: dṛṣṭa eva dharme tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. evaṃ bhagavann
S06psp_2-3u:629_3: iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥt pratyaśroṣīt bhagavān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:630_0: yaḥ kaścit kauśikānyatīrthikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā
S06psp_2-3u:630_1: abhimāniko vā pudgalo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto vivecayitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:634: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānām utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ kṣipraṃ punar evāntardhāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:635: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:636: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā,
S06psp_2-3u:637_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:637_1: caratā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vigrahān vivādān virodhān āpadyante te
S06psp_2-3u:637_2: 'dhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ sarve sarvadā parityaktā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:637_3: sattvadauḥśīlyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya
S06psp_2-3u:637_4: tān sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsām
S06psp_2-3u:637_5: āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān
S06psp_2-3u:637_6: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante tān
S06psp_2-3u:637_7: bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:637_8: pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣiptacittam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo
S06psp_2-3u:637_9: mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:637_10: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06psp_2-3u:637_11: ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān mahāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:637_12: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kauśika sattvā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsāre saṃsaranti yad utānunayapratighaparyavasthāne
S06psp_2-3u:638: upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vinīya tān sattvāṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_2-3u:639_0: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu
S06psp_2-3u:639_1: baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu śūnyatāyāṃ vānimitte 'praṇihite samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_2-3u:639_2: ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv āryasatyeṣv abhijñāsu daśabalavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_2-3u:639_3: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06psp_2-3u:639_5: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:639_6: carato dṛṣṭā dhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:639_7: abhisaṃbudhyate. dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvān yathāpraṇidhāne pratiṣṭhāpya nirupadhiśeṣe
S06psp_2-3u:639_8: nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyanti. ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāmparāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:640: punar aparaṃ kauśika yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:641_0: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe mārā vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā
S06psp_2-3u:641_1: vā ābhimānikā vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanti cittavikṣepaṃ kartuṃ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:641_2: vigrahāya vivādāya virodhāya. uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti yad utāsyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:641_3: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇenānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:641_4: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghi nām' auṣadhī tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitenāhārārthinā
S06psp_2-3u:641_5: āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścid eva prāṇakajāto dṛṣṭo bhavet,
S06psp_2-3u:642: sa taṃ prāṇakajātaṃ punaḥ khāditukāmaḥ prāṇakajātam anudhāvet.
S06psp_2-3u:643: atha khalu sa prāṇajātaḥ yena sā maghi nām' auṣadhi tenopasaṃkrāmed atha sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhena pratyudāvartate. tat (PSP_2-3:44)
S06psp_2-3u:645_0: tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ yat tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:645_1: evaṃ balavatī hi sā kauśika auṣadhī evam eva kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06psp_2-3u:645_2: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:645_3: ca manasikariṣyati. tatra kauśika ye utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:645_4: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanty upaśamiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:645_5: yato yata evotpatsyante tatra tatraivāntardhāsyanti na vivardhiṣyanty upaśamiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:648: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇam upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā,
S06psp_2-3u:650_0: yad uta rāgasya doṣasya mohasyāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyānām
S06psp_2-3u:650_2: ātmadṛṣṭeḥ sattvadṛṣṭer jīvadṛṣṭeḥ poṣadṛṣṭeḥ puruṣadṛṣṭeḥ pudgaladṛṣṭer manujadṛṣṭer
S06psp_2-3u:650_3: mānavadṛṣṭeḥ kārakadṛṣṭer vedakadṛṣṭer jānakadṛṣṭeḥ paśyakadṛṣṭer ucchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer
S06psp_2-3u:650_4: astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭer yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādasya kauśīdyasya
S06psp_2-3u:650_11: sarvākārajñatāgrāhasya nirvāṇagrāhasyopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:651: atha khalu ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājāno (PSP_2-3:45)
S06psp_2-3u:652_0: lokapālāḥ śakrā devendrā ye ca brahmāṇo brahmā ca sahāpatir yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrās
S06psp_2-3u:652_1: te satatasamitaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:652_2: yatra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:652_3: paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. ye 'pi te daśasu
S06psp_2-3u:652_4: dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi tasya kulaputrasya
S06psp_2-3u:652_5: vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:652_6: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:653_1: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. adhyātmaśūnyatayā vivardhiṣyate na
S06psp_2-3u:653_4: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati.
S06psp_2-3u:653_5: satyābhijñābhir daśabalair vaiśāradyaiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
S06psp_2-3u:653_6: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair
S06psp_2-3u:654: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. iti mārge dharmajñānam
S06psp_2-3u:655: sa ādeyavacanaś ca mitavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:663: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:667: cānye 'dattādānāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:671: ye 'pi cānye kāmamithyācārāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:675: ye 'pi cānye mṛṣāvādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:679: ye 'pi cānye piśunavacanāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:683: ye 'pi cānye paruṣavacanāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:687: ye 'pi cānye saṃbhinnapralāpāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:691: ye 'pi cānye 'bhidhyāyāḥ prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:695: ye 'pi cānye vyāpādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:699: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī (PSP_2-3:47)
S06psp_2-3u:703: dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. ye 'pi cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:707: ye 'pi cānye śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:711: ye 'pi cānye kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:715: ye 'pi cānye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:719: ye 'pi cānye dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:723: ye 'pi cānye prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:726: adhyātmaśūnyātāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. ye 'pi cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:727: ātmanā ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati, parāṃś ca (PSP_2-3:48)
S06psp_2-3u:730: ye 'pi cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:734: ye 'pi cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:735: ātmanā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:738: ye 'pi cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:742: ye 'pi cānye sarvasamādhisamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:746: ye 'pi cānye dhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:750: ye 'pi cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:751: ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate,
S06psp_2-3u:754: ye 'pi cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:759: samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:763: ye 'pi cānye karuṇāmuditopekṣāḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:767: ye 'pi cānye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:768: ātmanā ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ upasaṃpadya vihariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:771: ye 'pi cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:775: ye 'pi cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:776: evam ātmanā ca catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:781: ye 'pi cānye mārgaṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:785: ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:789: ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:794: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyante teṣāṃ api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:798: ye 'pi cānye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:799: ātmanā ca daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpatsyate,
S06psp_2-3u:800_0: parāṃś ca daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādāpayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:800_1: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:801: ye 'pi cānye daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:804: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:805: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:809: ye 'pi cānye 'saṃmoṣadharmatāyāṃ pratiṣṭāpitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:811: parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:812: ye 'pi cānye sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:813_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dadāti
S06psp_2-3u:813_1: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:813_2: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty (PSP_2-3:51)
S06psp_2-3u:814_0: anupalambhayogena. yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:814_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad vīryam ārabhate tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:814_2: kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
S06psp_2-3u:814_3: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:814_4: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_2-3u:814_5: pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
S06psp_2-3u:814_6: vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir evam utpadyate:
S06psp_2-3u:818: na ca me buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:819: na ca sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:829: yayā rūpasaṃpadā bodhisattvacārikāṃ me carataḥ. sattvāḥ saha darśanena niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:832: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:835: na vīryam ārapsye kathaṃ buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:842: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:844_0: prajñopāyakauśalyena śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya
S06psp_2-3u:844_1: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvajñatām abhisaṃboddhuṃ nāhaṃ śikṣiṣyāmi sa evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate,
S06psp_2-3u:847_0: evaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena śīlapāramitāṃ vyāpādavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ kauśīdyavaśena vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:847_1: vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena prajñāpāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:847_2: aparipūrayan dānapāramitām evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ cāparipūrayan
S06psp_2-3u:847_3: na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ hi kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadharmikān
S06psp_2-3u:847_4: sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilabhate ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:847_5: paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:850: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:851: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_2-3u:853: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā?
S06psp_2-3u:854: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:855: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo dānāṃ dadāti. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:856_1: sa etena dānenānupāyakauśalyenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_2-3u:859: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikīṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:862: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ vīryam ārambhamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:865: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:868: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_2-3:53)
S06psp_2-3u:872: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikyāṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:894_0: sa tenāhaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśenonnatiṃ gacchati. evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_2-3u:894_1: laukikeṣu dharmeṣu carann unnatiṃ gacchati. ahaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśena. tasya khalu
S06psp_2-3u:894_2: punaḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:895: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottareṣu dharmeṣu caran dānaṃ dadad dāyakaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:897_0: deyaṃ ca nopalabhate. evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paridamanāya
S06psp_2-3u:897_1: pratyupasthito bhavati pariṇāmanāya. evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayamāno vīryam
S06psp_2-3u:897_2: ārambhamāṇo dhyānaṃ dhyāyan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
S06psp_2-3u:898: āryasatyāny abhijñāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. balāni vaiśāradyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:899_0: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayan nopalabhate. sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhin sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:899_1: bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca bhāvayan nopalabhate yāvat
S06psp_2-3u:899_2: sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:899_3: caran paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthito bhavati. iti sarvato damananamanakāritram
S06psp_2-3u:901: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:902_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇan
S06psp_2-3u:902_1: vā dhārayan vā vācayan vā paryavāpnuvan vā pravartayan vā svādhyāyan vā yoniśo manasikurvan
S06psp_2-3u:902_2: vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣam ārūḍhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne saṃgrāme 'vatīrṇo vā śayito vātikrānto
S06psp_2-3u:902_3: vā niṣaṇṇo vā sthito vā syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:903_0: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yat tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:903_1: udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
S06psp_2-3u:903_2: vā kaścid eva kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā kṣipet kṣiptāni vā tasya tāni śarīre
S06psp_2-3u:904: paropakramena vāsya jīvitāntarāyo bhaven naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:905_0: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dīrgharātram iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06psp_2-3u:905_1: ātmano rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi nirjitāni bhavanti. pareṣām api rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:905_2: nirjitāni. ātmano doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāni mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
S06psp_2-3u:905_3: api doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitām. ātmano dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni
S06psp_2-3u:905_4: dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni.
S06psp_2-3u:905_5: ātmanaḥ paryutthānakāṇḍāni paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām api paryutthānakāṇḍāni
S06psp_2-3u:905_6: paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. ātmano 'nuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
S06psp_2-3u:905_7: apy anuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya
S06psp_2-3u:905_8: vā kuladuhitur vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā śarīre kṣiptaṃ na patati. iti kleśanirjayakāritram
S06psp_2-3u:906: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:907: avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid evābhaiṣajyam avakiret,
S06psp_2-3u:908: kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadāṃ vopanāmayec chastreṇa vā hanyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake vainac chorayet sarvāṇy etāni tasya na krāmanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:911: kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi kauśika śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06psp_2-3u:916_0: tathā hi naivātmānam upalabhate. na parān nobhayam upalabhate. na rūpam upalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:916_1: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhate. na yāvad vyastasamastān
S06psp_2-3u:916_3: buddhadharmān yāvat sarvākārajñatām api nopalabhate. anupalabhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06psp_2-3u:918: nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratilabhate sarvasattvāṃś cāvalokayati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:919_0: atra hi vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
S06psp_2-3u:919_1: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_2-3u:919_2: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:919_3: ye 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣv etarhi pratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_2-3u:919_4: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_2-3u:920: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:921: na tatra maṇuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:922_0: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjārthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:922_1: devaputrās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:923_0: ye 'py anyeṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:923_1: akaniṣṭhā devāputrās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:924_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti te ca devaputrā agatyemāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:924_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti pūjayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:924_2: pratigamiṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tasyeme
S06psp_2-3u:924_3: dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍagatā
S06psp_2-3u:924_4: vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā vā tiryagyonigatān apy upādāya
S06psp_2-3u:924_5: na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:925_0: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
S06psp_2-3u:925_1: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. anāgatair api pratyutpannair api tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:925_2: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbhotsyate abhisaṃbudhyate ca. abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_2-3u:925_5: sattvān divyamānuṣyakāyaṃ saṃpattau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06psp_2-3u:925_6: 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:926_0: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sapṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūtaḥ kṛtaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:928: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:929_0: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatām
S06psp_2-3u:929_2: samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:930_0: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:930_1: pratiṣṭhāpya pratigṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet tāni ca satkuryād gurukuryād (PSP_2-3:57)
S06psp_2-3u:933: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:934: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:935: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:936: kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatā yo cāyaṃ tathāgatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:937: sa katarasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:938: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:939: ihaiva bhagavan śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:942: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:943_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:943_1: gacchati. sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:943_2: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā nirjātā. evam ayam ātmabhāvaśarīrapratilābhas
S06psp_2-3u:944_1: bhavati. evam asya sarvajñajñānahetuko 'yam ātmabhāvapratilābhaḥ. āśrayabhūtatvāt
S06psp_2-3u:944_2: sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo
S06psp_2-3u:944_3: 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi sata eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:945: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkāreṇa vācayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati,

S06psp_2-3u:1263: ato nirjātā hi sarvajñatā yad uta prajñāpāramitā nirjātā sarvajñatā nirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:1265: tathā hi nānyā prajñāpāramitā nānyā sarvajñatā iti hi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:1266: evam ukte bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat (PSP_2-3:77)
S06psp_2-3u:1268: yathā vadasi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iti svaparārthādhimuktir mṛdumadhyā
S06psp_2-3u:1269: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1270_0: tathā hi bhagavān na dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati na śīlapāramitāyā na
S06psp_2-3u:1270_1: kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06psp_2-3u:1273: nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,

S06psp_2-3u:1275: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
S06psp_2-3u:1276: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1277: prajñāpāramitā ānanda pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā yad uta ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1278: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1280: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1283: ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1285: apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ apariṇāmitā kṣāntir apariṇāmitaṃ vīryam apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1286: ānanda āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata,
S06psp_2-3u:1287: kathaṃ punar bhagavan dānaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1289: kathaṃ punar bhagavan śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1291_0: advayayogenānanda dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1291_2: dānaṃ yāvat prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1292: ānanda āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1293: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ kathaṃ bhagavan prajñādvayayogena pariṇāmitā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:1295: rūpasyānanda advayayogena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyādvayayogena yāvad bodheḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1301: tathā hi ānanda rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam.
S06psp_2-3u:1303: tathā hi rūpaṃ ca vedanā ca saṃjñā ca saṃskārā ca vijñānaṃ ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ yāvad bodhiś ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1304_0: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā nu pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1304_2: āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1304_3: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
S06psp_2-3u:1304_4: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvad bodheḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā.
S06psp_2-3u:1304_5: tadyathāpi nāmānanda mahāpṛthivīṃ niśrāya sāmagrīvaśena bījāni virohanti. evam evānanda
S06psp_2-3u:1304_6: prajñāpāramitāṃ niśrāya prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvāḥ. pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1305: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya āryasatyāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni virohanti. daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti yāvat sarvajñatā (PSP_2-3:79)
S06psp_2-3u:1306_0: virohati. sarvajñatāṃ pariniśrāya sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:1306_2: yāvad āveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti. tasmād ānanda prajñāpāramitaivāsāṃ pāramitānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1306_3: pariṇāyikā yāvād aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1307_0: śakra āha: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_1: sarvagūṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇāti imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_2: prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_2-3u:1307_3: bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā daśānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_4: kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_5: catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām
S06psp_2-3u:1307_6: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ trayānaṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_7: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_8: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1307_9: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā
S06psp_2-3u:1307_10: paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1310: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1311: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā yāvad yoniśo manasikṛtayā srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1314: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante.
S06psp_2-3u:1316: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1317: na punaḥ kauśika yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā teṣām etāvata evaṃ guṇān vadāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:1319_0: apramāṇena hi kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śīlaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1319_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1319_2: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. apramāṇena samādhiskandhena
S06psp_2-3u:1319_4: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1319_5: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. tathāgatapratimās te
S06psp_2-3u:1319_6: kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā veditavyā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1319_7: dhārayiyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena
S06psp_2-3u:1319_8: cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. yaś ca kauśika sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1320_0: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvihāriṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1320_1: prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ asya kauśika śīlaskandhasya
S06psp_2-3u:1321: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06psp_2-3u:1322: saṃkhyām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
S06psp_2-3u:1324: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1325_0: na ca kaścid dharmo nāvigato na jñātaḥ. ye kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1326: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ime dṛṣṭadhārmikāḥ sāṃparāyikāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1328: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1329_0: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1329_1: saṃvidhāsyāmi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06psp_2-3u:1330_0: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvajñatācittena imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1331: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1332_0: teṣāṃ punaḥ kauśika kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1332_1: bahūni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1332_2: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ pratibhānaṃ te devaputrā
S06psp_2-3u:1332_3: upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. yadāpi te dharma bhāṇakā na mantrayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1332_4: tadāpi tenaiva devaputrā dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. imam
S06psp_2-3u:1332_5: api kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaguṇaṃ pratilapsyante ya imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1332_6: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:1332_7: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1333_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1333_1: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ purato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati ko vā mamānuyokṣyate upālapsyate ceti.
S06psp_2-3u:1335: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1336_0: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā abhinnā laukikāś ca lokottarāś ca sādhāraṇāś
S06psp_2-3u:1336_1: ca kuśalāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca śrāvakadharmāś ca pratyekabuddhadharmāś ca
S06psp_2-3u:1338: tathā hi te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:82)
S06psp_2-3u:1339: sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitās te upālambhaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:1340: yo 'py upālabhyeta tam api na samanupaśyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:1341: evaṃ hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānām upālambho na bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1342_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato
S06psp_2-3u:1342_1: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvataś cittaṃ nāvalīyate na
S06psp_2-3u:1342_2: saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
S06psp_2-3u:1344_0: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati ya ālīyeta vā saṃlīyeta
S06psp_2-3u:1344_1: vā uttrasyed vā saṃtrasyed vā saṃtrāsam āpadyate vā. imān api sa kauśika kulaputro
S06psp_2-3u:1344_2: vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratigrahīṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1344_3: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:1345_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:1345_1: udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1345_2: ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1345_3: sa priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṛṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ,

S06psp_2-3u:1347: anācchedena ca pratibhānena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā dānapāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. evam anācchedyayā śīlapāramitayā (PSP_2-3:83)

S06psp_2-3u:1348_4: samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyair āryasatyair anācchedyābhir apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,

S06psp_2-3u:1352_2: lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās

S06psp_2-3u:1355_8: avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ,

S06psp_2-3u:1358_2: traṇāya hitasukhāya saṃprasthitāḥ. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātramadhyā
S06psp_2-3u:1359: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1360: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jñāsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1361: iha cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā āgacchanti yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā āgacchantīti?
S06psp_2-3u:1362: evaṃ samantād daśabhyo digbhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā satkartuṃ vā gurukartuṃ vā mānayituṃ vā pūjayituṃ vā.

S06psp_2-3u:1365_0: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ jñāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā

S06psp_2-3u:1367: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1368_0: tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā devatā āgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya dhārayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:1368_1: vācayitvā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti. yāś ca
S06psp_2-3u:1368_2: tatra pṛthivīpradeśe 'lpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā bhaviṣyanti tās tato 'pakramitavyaṃ

S06psp_2-3u:1368_4: yathāyathā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devatā upasaṃkramiṣyanti tathātathā te kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1368_5: kuladuhitaro vā udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti. tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe 'caukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
S06psp_2-3u:1370_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyo na klānto bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1370_1: kāyasukhaṃ bhaviṣyati. kāyalaghutāṃ ca bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipanno

S06psp_2-3u:1370_3: kāyasukhatāṃ cittalaghutāṃ cittakarmaṇyatāṃ cittasukhatāṃ ca jñāsyati. sukhena sa
S06psp_2-3u:1370_4: rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati. imāṃ eva prajñāpāramitām āśayena kalpayan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1371_0: drakṣyaṃś ca punaḥ svapnena tathāgatān evārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇacitritagātrān
S06psp_2-3u:1372_1: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratisaṃyuktām eva kathāṃ śroṣyati. tāsāṃ ca pāramitānām
S06psp_2-3u:1372_2: arthaṃ śroṣyati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām arthaṃ śroṣyati. bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1372_3: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkramamāṇaṃ drakṣyati. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:1372_5: bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharmasaṃgītiratāni evaṃ sarvajñatā
S06psp_2-3u:1372_6: parigrahītavyā evaṃ sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitavyam
S06psp_2-3u:1372_7: iti. bahunāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśataśahasrāṇāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1373_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1373_1: śabdaṃ śroṣyati. amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iyadbhir
S06psp_2-3u:1373_3: dharmaṃ deśayati. pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni
S06psp_2-3u:1373_4: yāvad daśasu dikṣu bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni.
S06psp_2-3u:1373_5: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ stūpān dhātudharān nānāratnamayān bahūni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:1373_6: drakṣyati. tāṃś ca stūpān satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1374_0: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān evaṃrūpān bhadrakāṃś ca svapnān
S06psp_2-3u:1374_1: drakṣyati. sa sukham eva svapsyati sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1374_2: saṃjñāsyati. laghuṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjñāsyati na guruṃ. na cāsya balavatī gṛddhir āhāre
S06psp_2-3u:1374_4: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādher vyutthitasya manasikārasaṃtarpitena
S06psp_2-3u:1374_5: cittena na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:1375: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1377: tathā hi tasyāmanuṣyā ojaḥ kāya upasaṃharanti. ye cāpi (PSP_2-3:87)
S06psp_2-3u:1378_1: ojaḥ kāye prakṣipanti. imaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1378_2: guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīte paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati
S06psp_2-3u:1378_3: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrā
S06psp_2-3u:1379_0: kiṃ cāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhṇīyān na dhārayen
S06psp_2-3u:1379_1: na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryān na parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayed
S06psp_2-3u:1379_2: api tu khalu punaḥ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1380_0: yaś ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
S06psp_2-3u:1380_1: vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayet tāṃ ca likhitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1380_3: ayaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:1381_0: na tv eva yaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
S06psp_2-3u:1381_2: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1382: tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1383: iti parārthādhimuktir mṛdumṛddhi stūpasatkāraparivarto nāma tṛtīyaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1384: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1385: yady ayaṃ kauśika jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ bhavet,
S06psp_2-3u:1386: tāni te kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upanāmayed,
S06psp_2-3u:1388: tatas tvaṃ tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ kaṃ parigṛhṇīyāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:1389: śakra āha: saced me bhagavann ayaṃ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇām upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:1390: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta parikalpam upādāya imām evāhaṃ tayor dvayor (PSP_2-3:88)
S06psp_2-3u:1391: bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1392: na mama bhagavaṃs teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:1393_0: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarirāṇi na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo
S06psp_2-3u:1393_1: na pūjayitukāmo. api tu khalu punar me bhagavann evaṃ syāt prajñāpāramitānirjātāni
S06psp_2-3u:1393_2: tathāgataśarirāṇi yena tāni satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante,
S06psp_2-3u:1394: prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi yena tāni pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1395: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1396_0: prajñāpāramitā kauśika agrāhyā anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā. tat
S06psp_2-3u:1396_1: kathaṃ tvam agrāhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām anidarśanām apratighām ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utālakṣaṇām
S06psp_2-3u:1398: na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya anugrahāya vā sthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:1399: na hānāya na vṛddhaye notkṣepāya na vikṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya,
S06psp_2-3u:1402: na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ na śaikṣadharmāṇāṃ nāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:1408: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāriputra yathā vadasi na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī yāvan na sarvajñatāyā dātrī. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1414: atha khalu bhagavān śakrasya devānām indrasya sādhukāram adāt:
S06psp_2-3u:1415: sādhu sādhu kauśika evam etad yathā nirdiśasi na prajñāpāramitā dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:1421: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetos?

S06psp_2-3u:1425: dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:1426: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
S06psp_2-3u:1428: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_2-3u:1429: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
S06psp_2-3u:1430: tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:1431: bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
S06psp_2-3u:1433: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_2-3u:1434: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
S06psp_2-3u:1435: bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
