S06psp_2-3u:1517: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1518: saced bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāś cūḍikābaddhā bhaveyur,
S06psp_2-3u:1519: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:1520: tayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1521: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1522_0: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryāt
S06psp_2-3u:1522_1: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya parittīkṛtāni divyāni mānuṣyakāṇi ca sukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:1522_2: pratyanubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1522_3: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1522_4: deveṣu sukhaṃ pratyanubhūya tena kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:1523: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvato dhyānapāramitā (PSP_2-3:96)
S06psp_2-3u:1524_0: paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūrṇā vīryapāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā
S06psp_2-3u:1524_1: kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripurṇā śīlaparamitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:1524_2: paripūrṇā dānapāramitā paripūryate dānapāramitā paripūrṇā. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:1525: so 'tikramya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:1527_0: yair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati. yadi vā cakravartyātmabhāvaṃ paigṛhya kṣatriya
S06psp_2-3u:1527_1: mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya brāhmaṇa mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya gṛhapatimahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1527_2: parigṛhya sattvān paripācayiṣyati. tasmād bhagavan na me tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravam
S06psp_2-3u:1527_3: eva me bhagavan nāpi na grahītukāmaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā satkṛtayā
S06psp_2-3u:1527_4: gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā tathāgataśarīrāṇy api satkṛtāni bhavanti gurukṛtāni
S06psp_2-3u:1528_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv
S06psp_2-3u:1528_1: aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti. tāṃś ca
S06psp_2-3u:1528_2: dharmakāyena ca rūpakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
S06psp_2-3u:1528_3: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:1528_4: ca manasikartavyā. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tān daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1529: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:1530: dharmatayā dve ime bhagavatāṃ dharmate. katame dve?
S06psp_2-3u:1533_1: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatājñānaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yad āryasatyeṣu yad
S06psp_2-3u:1534: yac caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu (PSP_2-3:97)
S06psp_2-3u:1535: jñānaṃ, yat kuśalamūleṣu sāsravānāsraveṣu sāvadyānavadyeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃkleśavyavadānadharmeṣu jñānam iyam ucyate saṃskṛtadharmatā.
S06psp_2-3u:1537: yasya dharmasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nāsthiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1538: nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1539: yāvat sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā. katamā sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā?
S06psp_2-3u:1540_0: yā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:1540_3: abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā parabhāvaśūnyatā. yat sarvadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1540_4: prakṛtiśūnyatātvam anupalambho yāvad yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilapyatā apravyāhāratā
S06psp_2-3u:1542: atha khalu bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:1543_0: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_2-3u:1543_1: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
S06psp_2-3u:1543_2: te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva
S06psp_2-3u:1543_3: prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'py etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu
S06psp_2-3u:1543_4: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti
S06psp_2-3u:1543_5: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
S06psp_2-3u:1543_6: te 'bhūvann atītānāgatāḥ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:1545: ye 'pi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakā,
S06psp_2-3u:1546: ye ca pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvakabodhipratyekabodhiprāptās. tat kasya hetos? tathā hy (PSP_2-3:98)
S06psp_2-3u:1548_1: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1549_0: na hi prajñāpāramitāyām apāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā sthalaṃ vā nimnaṃ vā samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1549_1: vā nimittaṃ vā animittaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā
S06psp_2-3u:1549_2: kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā prajñāyate. na ca kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1549_3: prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pradāyikā na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ nārhatvadharmāṇāṃ pradāyikā.
S06psp_2-3u:1551_0: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi bhagavan bodhisattvā
S06psp_2-3u:1551_1: mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni prajānanti na ca
S06psp_2-3u:1552: na jīvaṃ na poṣaṃ na puruṣaṃ na manujaṃ na mānavaṃ na kārakaṃ na vedakaṃ na jānakaṃ na paśyakam upalabhante. na rūpam upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1553: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhante. na pṛthivīdhātum upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1554: nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ na vijñānadhātum upalabhante. na cakṣur upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1558_0: yad api tac cakṣūrūpasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā
S06psp_2-3u:1558_1: aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1559_0: śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopalabhante yāvad yad api tan manodharmasaṃsparśapratyayād
S06psp_2-3u:1559_1: utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. smṛtyupasthānāninopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1559_3: nopalabhante. nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr na ṣaḍabhijñā
S06psp_2-3u:1560: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhante. nādhyātmaśūnyatām upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:1561_0: na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1561_1: na samādhīn na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhante. na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:1561_2: na bodhiṃ na buddhaṃ na buddhadharmān upalabhante. na hi prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena
S06psp_2-3u:1562: tathā hi svabhāvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:1566: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhim api nopalabhate prāg eva bodhisattvadharmān.
S06psp_2-3u:1567: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eva carati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
S06psp_2-3u:1569_0: sarvāsu kauśika pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati na kevalaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:1569_1: tac cānupalambhayogena sa dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1570: śīlapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlyam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1571: kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopalabhate kṣamiṇam api nopalabhate kṣamyam api nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ nopalabhate kartavyam api nopalabhate kāyacittam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1572: dhyānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate cittam api nopalabhate samādhim api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:1573_0: prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate prajñayam api nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:1573_1: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_2-3u:1573_2: dānaṃ dadataḥ. prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1573_3: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato vīryam ārambhamāṇasya dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya dharmān vibhāvayato
S06psp_2-3u:1573_4: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:1574_2: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām anupalambhayogena. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1574_3: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:1574_5: anupalambhayogena yāvat sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika
S06psp_2-3u:1574_7: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ cchāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ copalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:1575_0: api tu cchāyā cchāyeti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1575_1: sarvajñātāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣo na nānākaraṇam upalabhyate 'nupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:1576: iti parārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrety ukto adhimuktimanaskāraḥ guṇaparikīrtanaparivarto nāma caturthaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:1577: śakra āha: mahāguṇasamanvāgatā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:1578_2: kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api
S06psp_2-3u:1579: tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir yathopadiṣṭāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād,
S06psp_2-3u:1580: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt,
S06psp_2-3u:1583: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:1584: kauśika, yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1585: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
S06psp_2-3u:1586: so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tat sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ (PSP_2-3:101)
S06psp_2-3u:1589: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājāneyāyaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi svayaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:1590_0: so 'pi sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dādyād ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1590_1: puṇyaṃ prasavet. evam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānena tathāgatena vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya
S06psp_2-3u:1590_2: ātmabhāvaṃ vajropamaṃ bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanaya
S06psp_2-3u:1590_3: sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ sattvānām. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1591_0: ye kecid bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛttasyāntaśaḥ sarṣapaphalamātrakam api dhātuṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1591_1: pūjayiṣyanti sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tasya kuśalamūlasya paryanto 'dhigantuṃ yāvat parinirvāṇam iti.
S06psp_2-3u:1593_0: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1593_1: satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyaty arcayiṣyaty apacāyiṣyate puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1594: parasmai ca likhitvā dadyād evaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti prathamā stutimātra
S06psp_2-3u:1595_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1595_1: parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayed vibhajed uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa kulaputro
S06psp_2-3u:1595_2: vā kuladuhitā vā tataḥ pūrvakāt kulaputrād vā kuladuhitur vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:1596: anyatarānyataro vā gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:1597: eṣa evātra śāstā draṣṭavyo yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstā anyā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:1600: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā atītānāgatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prādurbhūtāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1602: te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (PSP_2-3:102)
S06psp_2-3u:1603: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. atraiva kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakāḥ śikṣitāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1606_0: bodhisattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmanti avakrāntāś ca avakramiṣyanti ca. tasmāt
S06psp_2-3u:1606_1: tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saṃmukhaṃ

S06psp_2-3u:2323: yathā śāriputra śāstari tathā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,

S06psp_2-3u:2330: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:

S06psp_2-3u:2332: atha khalv āyuṣmān śariputraḥ sakrasya devānām indrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2334_0: kuta iyam āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā kiṃnidānā veti. prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2334_1: kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upāyakauśalena ca teṣām atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:2335_1: abhibhavati. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2335_2: vā pariṇāyakam abhavyaṃ mārgāvatārāya kuta eva nagarapraveśāya?
S06psp_2-3u:2336: evam eva kauśika imā pañcapāramitā jātyandhabhūtā bhavanti prajñāpāramitāṃ vinā pariṇāyakā abhavyā mārgāvatārāya kuta eva sarvākārajñatāmahānagaram anuprāptaye?
S06psp_2-3u:2337: yadā punaḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā bhavanti tadā pañcapāramitāḥ sacakṣuskā bhavanti pāramitānāmadheyaṃ ca pratilabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:2338: śakra āha: yad bhadanta śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_2-3u:2339_0: prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ pañcapāramitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. na ca bhadanta
S06psp_2-3u:2339_1: śariputra dānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2341_0: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. na dānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2341_1: labhante. evaṃ na śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2341_2: pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tasmāt tarhi kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānām
S06psp_2-3u:2341_3: agrā ākhyāyate śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate varā ākhyāyate pravarā ākhyāyate
S06psp_2-3u:2341_4: uttamā ākhyāyate anuttamā ākhyāyate asamā ākhyāyate asamasamā ākhyāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2343: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2346_1: saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyānabhinirhārāyā prajñāpāramiṭābhinirhartvyā. evaṃ dhātūnām āyatanānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2356: evam abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmam arpayati?
S06psp_2-3u:2358: evam abhinirhṛtā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati,
S06psp_2-3u:2359: yato na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati tasmāt prajñāpāramiteti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:2363_0: na kuśalaṃ dharmam arpayati nākuśalaṃ dharmam arpayati. evaṃ na sāvadyaṃ nānavadyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2363_1: na sāsravaṃ nānāsravaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na niḥkleśaṃ na laukikaṃ

S06psp_2-3u:2365: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2366: kim iyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati?
S06psp_2-3u:2369: kim iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayatīti. evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:2370: prajñāpāramitā kauśika na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati nopalabhate sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:2372: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati nopalabhate?
S06psp_2-3u:2374: na hi kauśika prajñāpramitā yathā nāma yathā nimittaṃ yathābhisaṃskāras tathārpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:2378: yathā nopaiti nopādadāti nadhitiṣṭhati na prajahāti nābhiniviśate (PSP_2-3:146)
S06psp_2-3u:2379: tathārpayati yathā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti. evaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmān nārpayati na muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_2-3u:2380: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāya anirodhāya anabhisaṃskārāya anupalabdhaye avināśāya pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2381: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2382: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjñāsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:2384: riñciṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitām.
S06psp_2-3u:2386_0: asti subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñcan prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2386_1: dūrīkuryān prajñāpāramitām. saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjñāsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:2387: rikteyaṃ prajñāpāramiteyaṃ tucchā asārā vaśikeyaṃ prajñāpāramiteti,
S06psp_2-3u:2388_0: riñciṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2388_1: prajñāpāramitām. ayaṃ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa riñciṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2390: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan pratyarpitayā katame dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti?
S06psp_2-3u:2392: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2393: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na cakṣuḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2394: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2395: na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti. na dānapāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:2396_0: na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:2396_1: pratyarpitā bhavati. nādhyātmaśūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati. na bahirdhāśūnyatā pratyarpitā
S06psp_2-3u:2396_2: bhavati. nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:2396_3: pratyarpitā bhavati. na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti. na
S06psp_2-3u:2396_4: daśabalavaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:2396_5: na srotaāpattiphalṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2396_6: nānāgāmiphalaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. nārhattvaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2396_7: pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ pratyarpitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2399: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati yāvad na sarvākārajñatā pratyarpitā bhavati?
S06psp_2-3u:2401_0: rūpasya subhūte 'nupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatānupalabdhyā
S06psp_2-3u:2401_1: prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā
S06psp_2-3u:2401_2: na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati yāvad na sarvākārajñatā pratyarpita bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:2407: subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2410_0: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni
S06psp_2-3u:2410_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na dānapāramitāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti.
S06psp_2-3u:2410_2: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2410_3: mahatkaroti nālpīkatoti yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na
S06psp_2-3u:2410_4: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2410_5: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nābhijñā mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na tathāgatabalāni
S06psp_2-3u:2410_6: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti.
S06psp_2-3u:2410_7: na bodhiṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. yāvan
S06psp_2-3u:2410_8: na buddhaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ vipulīkaroti na parittīkaroti. na rūpaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2410_9: balavatkaroti na durbalīkaroti. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2410_10: mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. sacet punar navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo
S06psp_2-3u:2410_11: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamya dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2410_12: śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitām āgamya evaṃ jñāsyati na prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ mahatkaroti
S06psp_2-3u:2410_13: nālpīkaroti yāvan na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ balavatkaroti
S06psp_2-3u:2410_14: na durbalīkaroti. evaṃ saṃjānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2411: naiṣa bhagavan niṣyandaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. yad rūpaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryād yāvad buddhadharmaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryān naiṣa prajñāpāramitāyā niṣyandaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2412: na hy upalambhasaṃjñino bodhisattvās tathā sattvājātitayā prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā. rūpājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā (PSP_2-3:148)
S06psp_2-3u:2413_0: draṣṭavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā draṣṭavyā yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:2413_3: vijñānāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭayyā yāvad buddhāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā
S06psp_2-3u:2413_4: draṣṭavyā. rūpābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānābhāvatayā
S06psp_2-3u:2413_5: prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā yāvad buddhābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:2413_6: sattvaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā. rūpaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:2413_7: veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā
S06psp_2-3u:2413_8: yāvad buddhaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyata veditavyā. evaṃ sattvānimittatayā sattvāpraṇihitatayā
S06psp_2-3u:2413_19: veditavyā yāvad buddhabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā vedjtavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:2413_20: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:2415: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2416: yo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:2418: kiyaccirasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06psp_2-3u:2426: kiyacciraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carito ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhimokṣyate?
S06psp_2-3u:2427: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2428: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsyehāgata ihopapanno bhaviṣyati. iti buddhasevā
S06psp_2-3u:2429: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyāny aprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi samudāgato 'bhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:2430_0: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2430_1: carito vīryapāramitāyāṃ carito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2430_2: sann ihāgato bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_2-3u:2430_3: dṛṣṭayā śrutayā vā śāstā mayā dṛṣṭa iti cittam utpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:2431: śāstā mayā śruta iti cittam utpādayiṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhigamiṣyaty animittādvayānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:2432: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2433: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā draṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
S06psp_2-3u:2435_0: no hīdaṃ subhūte na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śrotāro draṣṭāro na prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2435_1: te paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādaya. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2435_2: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ te na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
S06psp_2-3u:2435_3: upādāya. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
S06psp_2-3u:2435_4: upādāya. smṛtyupasthānāni na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
S06psp_2-3u:2435_5: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evam āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2435_7: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na paśyanti
S06psp_2-3u:2435_8: na śṛṇvanti. buddhabodhiṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:2437: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2438: kiyacciraṃ caritaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpatsyate?
S06psp_2-3u:2442_0: syāt subhūte paryāyo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2442_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2442_2: śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tac copāyakauśalena na ca kaṃcid
S06psp_2-3u:2442_3: dharmaṃ pratikṣipati yathā nopacayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2443: na jātu ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir virahito bhavati na buddhair bhagavadbhir,
S06psp_2-3u:2444_0: yaiś ca pūjāviśeṣair ākāṅkṣet tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2444_1: pūjayituṃ tasya te pūjāviśeṣāḥ sahacittotpādenaiva saṃṛdhyante. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2444_2: saṃkrāmati. na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate. na ca jātu virahito bhavati abhijñābhir.
S06psp_2-3u:2444_3: na ca kenacit kleśena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. na śrāvakacittena na pratyekabuddhacittena
S06psp_2-3u:2444_4: sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati sattvāṃś ca paripācayan
S06psp_2-3u:2444_5: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayan. ayaṃ subhūte bobhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2444_6: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yogam āpatsyate. ity upāyakauśalam
S06psp_2-3u:2445_0: santi punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair bahūni buddhaśatāni
S06psp_2-3u:2445_1: bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:2445_2: dṛṣṭāni bhavanti. tebhyaś cāntike śikṣamāṇair dānāni dattāni bhavanti,
S06psp_2-3u:2446_0: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntir bhāvitā vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānam āsevitaṃ prajñā bhāvitā bhavati
S06psp_2-3u:2446_1: sā copalambhayogena. te 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ parṣaḍbhyo
S06psp_2-3u:2446_2: 'pakramiṣyanti. te punaḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāgauravatayāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2446_3: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād apakramiṣyanti. ihaiva te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_2-3u:2446_4: ca mahāyānikāḥ saṃnipatitā ye gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakramiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:2447: tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca pūrvānte 'pi gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāntā,
S06psp_2-3u:2448_0: etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāmānti. na kāyena na
S06psp_2-3u:2448_1: cittena samagrīn dāsyanti duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmopaceṣyanti. te tena dauṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena
S06psp_2-3u:2448_2: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:2449_0: taiḥ pratyākhyāya atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatāpratyākhyātā
S06psp_2-3u:2449_1: bhavati. te tena sarvajñatāpratyākhyānena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena
S06psp_2-3u:2449_2: bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi (PSP_2-3:151)
S06psp_2-3u:2450_0: bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahāniraye prakṣepsyante. teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2450_1: saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī vā apsaṃvartanī vā vāyusaṃvartanī vā prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:2450_2: te tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhātāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:2451_0: mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2451_1: punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti. tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu pūrvasyāṃ diśi prakṣepsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:2452_0: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi yo mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:2452_1: tebhyo 'pi punaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu
S06psp_2-3u:2452_2: prakṣepsyante. teṣu punar api tebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu tebhyo
S06psp_2-3u:2452_3: mahānirayebhaś cyutās tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇākṣīṇena punar eva ihopapatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:2452_4: te punar eva mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. te teṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannā
S06psp_2-3u:2452_5: bahūni tīvrāṇi mahākaṭukāni mahānirayaduḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti. tāvad eva te
S06psp_2-3u:2452_6: tāni nirayaduḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti yāvat punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:2452_7: saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv itaś cyutā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu punar eva mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:2452_8: evaṃ samantāt punar api daśasu dikṣu tiryagyoniṣūpapatsyante. punar eva daśasu dikṣu
S06psp_2-3u:2452_9: yamalokeṣūpapannā mahātīvrāṃ mahākaṭukāṃ mahāduṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayantas tat karma
S06psp_2-3u:2452_10: kṣepayiṣyanti. te bahuduḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma kṣepayitvā kadācit karhicit mānuṣyakam
S06psp_2-3u:2452_11: ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante. te yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra jātyandhā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:2452_12: jātyandhakuleṣūpapatsyante. caṇḍālakuleṣu vā puṣkasakuleṣu vā śākunikuleṣu vā sukarikuleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:2452_13: vā aurabhikakuleṣu vā nīceṣu vā kutsiteṣu vā kuleṣu vā nīcavṛttisu vā upapatsyante.

S06psp_2-3u:2894: yāvat subhūte nimittato manasikaroti tāvat saṅgaḥ. yāny api teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvasaṅgāpagatānāṃ sarvasaṅgāpagatāni kuśalamūlāni,

S06psp_2-3u:2898: na ca teṣām anyeṣāṃ vā kuśalamūlāni nimittato manasikartavyāni. iti sūkṣmasaṅgaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2899: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2906: tathā hi subhūte akṛtā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃskṛtā na sā kenacic chakyābhisaṃboddhum. iti dharmagambhīryam
S06psp_2-3u:2910: tathā hi subhūte na dve dharmaprakṛtī ekaiva subhūte (PSP_2-3:170)
S06psp_2-3u:2914_0: yā prakṛtiḥ sānabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekāṃ prakṛtim
S06psp_2-3u:2914_1: aprakṛtim anabhisaṃskṛtiṃ jānatā paśyatā sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti. iti sarvasaṅgavarjanam
S06psp_2-3u:2918: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kenacid dṛṣṭā na śrutā na matā na vijñātā nābhisaṃbuddhā. iti durbodhatā
S06psp_2-3u:2922: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kenacid vijñātā,
S06psp_2-3u:2923_0: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārair na vijñānena jñātā yāvan na vyastasamastaiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2923_1: skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgair na pāramitābhir na bodhipakṣyair dharmair
S06psp_2-3u:2923_3: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair nābhijñābhir na sarvaśūnyatābhir na sarvasamādhibhir
S06psp_2-3u:2923_4: na sarvadhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāveṇikair
S06psp_2-3u:2927: sarvadharmānupalabdhitaḥ kārikā subhūte prajñāpāramitā. ity acintyatvam ity uktau vipakṣapratipakṣau
S06psp_2-3u:2929: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_2-3u:2931: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_2-3u:2932: saced rūpe na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2933_0: saced na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_2-3u:2933_1: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_2-3u:2933_2: evaṃ sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
S06psp_2-3u:2933_3: samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge mārge na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_2-3u:2933_4: āryasatyeṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattisu
S06psp_2-3u:2933_5: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:2933_6: vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_2-3u:2933_7: sarvajñatāyām api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_2-3u:2936: saced rūpaṃ na nityaṃ nānityam iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2937: rūpaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkham iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2938: rūpaṃ nātmā nānātmeti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2939: rūpaṃ na śubhaṃ nāśubham iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2940: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityam iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2941_0: vijñānaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vijñānaṃ nātmā
S06psp_2-3u:2941_1: nānātmeti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vijñānaṃ na śubhaṃ nāśubham iti carati
S06psp_2-3u:2942: sarvajñatā na sukhā na duḥkheti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2943: sarvajñatā nātmā nānātmeti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2944: sarvajñatā na śubhā nāśubheti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2945: na tad rūpaṃ tathā saṃvidyate yasya nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:2946_0: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ tathā saṃvidyate yasya nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā
S06psp_2-3u:2946_1: sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. evaṃ vyastasamastaskandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:2946_4: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sā sarvajñatā tathā saṃvidyate
S06psp_2-3u:2946_5: yasyā nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2947: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saced rūpam aparipūrṇaṃ paripūrṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2948: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam aparipūrṇaṃ paripūrṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06psp_2-3u:2949: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgāny aparipūrṇāni paripūrṇānīti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ (PSP_2-3:172)
S06psp_2-3u:2950_0: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny aparipūrṇāni paripūrṇānīti na carati
S06psp_2-3u:2950_2: aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evam āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:2951_1: paripūrṇā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri
S06psp_2-3u:2951_2: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā
S06psp_2-3u:2951_3: iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvajñatā aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā iti
S06psp_2-3u:2951_4: na carati carati prajñāpārainitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2952: rūpasyāparipūrṇatā paripūrṇatā vā yā na tad rūpam evam api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2953_0: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparipūrṇatā paripūrṇatā vā yā na tad vijñānam
S06psp_2-3u:2953_1: evam api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā aparipūrṇatā
S06psp_2-3u:2953_2: paripūrṇatā vā yā na sā sarvajñatā evam api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. iti
S06psp_2-3u:2954: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2955: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgaś cāsaṅgaś cākhyātaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:2957: evam etat subhūte svākhyātaḥ. subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgaś cāsaṅgaś ca.
S06psp_2-3u:2958: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2959: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. cakṣuḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06psp_2-3u:2960: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ sarvāyataneṣu dhātuṣu ca dānapāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06psp_2-3u:2962_0: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati carati
S06psp_2-3u:2962_1: prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2962_2: sasaṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:2963_0: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny abhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sasaṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati caṛati
S06psp_2-3u:2963_1: prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_2-3u:2965: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ sasaṅgam asaṅgam iti,
S06psp_2-3u:2966_0: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ sasaṅgam asaṅgam iti saṃjānīte. evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2966_3: na sasaṅgā asaṇgā iti saṃjānīte. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatā na sasaṅgāsaṅgeti
S06psp_2-3u:2966_4: saṃjānīte. na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na
S06psp_2-3u:2966_5: pratyekabodhir nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. sasaṅgāsaṅgeti saṃjānīte. iti rūpādiṣv asaṅgaprayogaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2967: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2968: āścaryam etad bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā deśyamānāpi na hīyate,
S06psp_2-3u:2972: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2973: evam etat subhūte prajñāpāramitā deśyamānāpi na hīyate,
S06psp_2-3u:2976: adeśyamānāpi na vardhate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhann ākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta avarṇaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:2977: na khalu punar ākāśasya varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe vṛddhir avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇe hāniḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:2978: na cākāśaṃ varṇena vardhate avarṇena hīyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2980: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na vardhate,
S06psp_2-3u:2983: avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇena pratihanyate. evam eva subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā deśitāpi tāvaty eva,
S06psp_2-3u:2986: duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati,
S06psp_2-3u:2989: na ca pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:2992: na dhyānapāramitā na vīryapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na śīlapāramitā na dānapāramitā prajñāyate. nākāśe rūpaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:2997_0: yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate. nākāśe smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante. nākāśe
S06psp_2-3u:2997_3: prajñāyante. nākāśe śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:2997_4: prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante. nākāśe śamathavipaśyanā prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2997_5: nākāśe daśatathāgatabalāni prajñāyante. nākāśe catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2997_6: prajñāyante. nākāśe 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2997_7: prajñāyate. nākāśe sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate. nākāśe 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2997_8: nākāśe 'rhattvaṃ prajñāyate. nākāśe pratyekabodhiḥ prajñāyate. nākāśe 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:2999_0: namaskaromi bhagavan bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyo yair ayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:2999_1: ākāśasya te bhagavan kṛtaśaḥ prayoktukāmā yatitukāmā dhyāyatukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:2999_2: saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2999_3: saṃnahyante. mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ākāśasamānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:2999_4: dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ity uddeśaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:3000: ākāśaṃ te bhagavann antarīkṣam utkṣeptukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. iti prayogaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:3001: mahāvīryapāramitāprāptās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:3002: saced bhagavann ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇaḥ syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:3003: tadyathāpi nāma naḍasvanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3004: te tathāgatāḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:3005: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimānān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
S06psp_2-3u:3006: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:3008: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. evam ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātavas tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇā (PSP_2-3:175)
S06psp_2-3u:3009: bhaveyuḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3010: te ca tathāgatās tiṣṭhantaḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:3011: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
S06psp_2-3u:3012: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:3014: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmi;
S06psp_2-3u:3015: ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. iti kāritraduṣkaratāprayogaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:3016: atha khalv anyatarasya bhikṣor etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:3017: namaskaromi bhagavan bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai yatra na kaścid dharma upalabhyate na nirudhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:3032: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:3033: yo bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yogam āpatsyate kva yogam āpatsyate?
S06psp_2-3u:3035: ākāśe sa kauśika yogam āpatsyate yo 'tra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:3036: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:3037_0: yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:3037_1: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati kāmam ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:3039: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum icchasi?
S06psp_2-3u:3040: śakra āha: nāhaṃ bhadanta subhūte taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:3042: sacet kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyanti saivaiṣāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptir bhaviṣyati. atha (PSP_2-3:176)
S06psp_2-3u:3043: virahitā bhaviṣyanti yathopadiṣṭayā prajñāpāramitayā lapsyante teṣāṃ manuṣyāś cāmanuṣyāś cāvatāram. ākāśasya sa kauśika rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:3044: yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:3048: evam eva kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,

S06psp_2-3u:3280: na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3281: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3282: na samādhīnāṃ na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3283: na srotaāpattiphalasya dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3284: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya nānāgāmiphalasya nārhattvasya na pratyekabuddhatvasya na sarvajñatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. iti dvitiyaṃ mārgajñatādhikārasamāptidīpanam
S06psp_2-3u:3285: sā khalu punar iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3286: na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3287: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3288: nāpi buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3289: na saṃskṛtadhātor dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:3290_0: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā
S06psp_2-3u:3290_1: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā. tāṃ tathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyate 'py abhisamety
S06psp_2-3u:3290_2: apy abhisaṃbudhyābhisamety ācaṣṭe deśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajaty uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_2-3u:3291_0: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇy upary antarīkṣe sthitvā kilikilāprakṣveḍitāny
S06psp_2-3u:3291_1: akārṣur divyāni cotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkapadmamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti sma. evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta,
S06psp_2-3u:3292: dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jāmbūdvīpe paśyāmaḥ. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirdiśya mānāyāṃ tatrānekāni devaputrasahasrāṇy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhante sma.
S06psp_2-3u:3293: atha khalu bhagavān sthaviraṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:3294: nedaṃ subhūte dvitiyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpy ekaṃ nāpīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pravartanāya vā nivartanāya vā pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_2-3u:3297: katamā bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya pravartanāya vā nivartanāya vā pratyupasthitā?
S06psp_2-3u:3299: prajñāpāramitā subhūte prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. evaṃ dhyānaṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntiṃ śīlaṃ dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
S06psp_2-3u:3300: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā,
S06psp_2-3u:3301: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā śūnyāni. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni mārgā mārgaśūnyatayā (PSP_2-3:185)
S06psp_2-3u:3315: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatā sarvajñatāśūnyatayā śūnyā.
S06psp_2-3u:3317_0: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā. sarvadharmasvabhāvāś ca sarvadharmasvabhāvaiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:3317_1: śūnyāḥ. bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:3317_2: abhisaṃbudhyante. na kaṃcid dharmam abhisaṃbudhyante dharmacakraṃ pravartanti,
S06psp_2-3u:3318: na kaṃcid dharmaṃ pravartayanti nivartayanti vā. na ca taiḥ kaścid dharmaḥ saṃdṛśyate,
S06psp_2-3u:3319: na kaścid dharmo dṛśyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:3320: tathā hi sarvadharmā nopalabhyante ye dharmāḥ pravartante vā nivartante vā. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_2-3u:3321: tathā hy atyantānabhiniviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. na hi śūnyatā pravartikā vā nivartikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:3323: nāpraṇihitaṃ pravartakaṃ vā nivartakaṃ vā. yā evaṃdeśanā sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prakāśanā kathanā prajñāpanā prasthāpanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā sūcanā uttānīkaraṇaṃ saṃprakāśanā,
S06psp_2-3u:3324: iyaṃ sā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitāyā deśanā. yā ca prajñāpāramitāyā deśanā na kenacid deśitā na kenacit pratīcchitā,
S06psp_2-3u:3325: sā na kenacit sākṣātkṛtā. yā na kenacit sākṣātkṛtā na tatra kaścit parinirvṛto nāpi tayā dharmadeśanayā kaścid dakṣiṇīyaḥ kṛtaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:3326: iti tṛtiyaṃ sarvākārajñatādhikārasamāptidīpanam ity uktā sarvajñatā
S06psp_2-3u:3327: āryapañcaviṃśatiśāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvajñatādhikāracaryāviśeṣaparivartaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
